name: Kylin Prime Capital
goal: Kylin Prime Capital is an integrated financial platform. It provides clients with a wide range of investment opportunities in real estate, private equity, liquid and fixed asset markets as well as fund management with one stop tailored services to High-Net-Worth Individuals and institutions.
interests: Banking and financial services, Borders and Security, Digital economy and society, Economy, finance and the euro, Migration and asylum, Taxation
euInitiatives: Kylin Prime Capital follows policies and legislative files surrounding financial services and financial markets as well as migration and global mobility, in particular those related to the investment migration field.
